scripts.deploy:workflows-sync: bun run deploy workflows/sync/embedding && bun run deploy workflows/sync/issue && bun run deploy workflows/sync/repo-init
scripts.deploy:workflows-sync:prod: bun run deploy workflows/sync/embedding --prod && bun run deploy workflows/sync/issue --prod && bun run deploy workflows/sync/repo-init --prod
scripts.deploy:all: bun run deploy rate-limiter && bun run deploy:workflows-sync && bun run deploy:workflows-background
scripts.deploy:all:prod: bun run deploy rate-limiter --prod && bun run deploy:workflows-sync:prod && bun run deploy:workflows-background:prod
